Comment: The F-35 program is the single most successful military procurement program of the modern era.  That is not exaggeration.  An F-35 now costs *less* than a modernized F-15. There are more F-35s than all other stealth aircraft from all other countries in the world, *combined*. And that *includes* all the rest of US stealth aircraft.  Sabotaging the F-35 program has been an explicit goal of Russia and China for years, now. It is the single most impactful platform in any potential conflict for the next probably 30 years.  Anyone trying to sink the F-35 program can only conceivably be doing it because they are actively working in the interests of a hostile foreign power.

Comment: not coined, but stolen. “woke” as a term (literally meaning to be “awake” to problems and societal injustices that are only left unfixed because the powers-that-be know that to fix them would neuter their ability to keep a sheeplike populace controlled in their ham-fisted grip) has been around for over a decade at this point.   this isn’t just right-wing stupidity either. yes, stupidity plays a large part, but it’s only a single facet of a calculated multi-angle effort to undermine the true ideals of social justice and disenfranchise people from the very concept of their own power. it used to be “BLM means thugs and looters,” then it became “CRT is destroying the white race,” then after that it was “DEI means merit is worthless,” and now we’re at the point of them mush-mouthedly calling ANYTHING that they dislike for any reason “woke.” except this time, they can’t even describe what “woke” is or means or why they’re fighting against it.   it’s “untermensch” all the fuck over again. a rabble-rousing umbrella term, intentionally poorly-defined, thrown to their thronging mouthbreathing knuckledragging masses specifically to let them ruin intellectual dialectical conversation with as little effort as possible.
